comment: Over years ago , the state of Minnesota welcomed my family with open arms . I never would ve had the opportunities that led me to Congress had I been rejected . What Beltrami County is doing is denying refugees a chance at a better life . <URL>

                                    :op1 "Congress"))))
            :time (e / ever)

      :snt3 (d / do-02
